author: Kate O’Keeffe
title: Elaine Wynn Launches Campaign to Remove Director From Casino’s Board
text:
Wynn Resorts Ltd.’s largest shareholder is starting a campaign to remove one of three board directors investigating sexual-misconduct allegations against former Chief Executive Steve Wynn.

Elaine Wynn, who co-founded the company with Mr. Wynn, her ex-husband, said in a Securities and Exchange Commission filing on Monday that shareholders shouldn’t vote to re-elect director John Hagenbuch to the board based on what she alleges are close ties to Mr. Wynn; she also cited as an issue the director’s involvement in deciding executive...
